channel.title: AoE Beta Online Key
channel.description: I have an Age of Empires Online Beta key if anyone wants it. Just reply.

item.title: AoE Beta Online Key
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:30, topic:392927”]Is it going to cost money?[/quote]Freemium macro transaction model. Basically you pay for a premium component of each civ which costs $20 at the moment (a civ here has the equivalent content of 4 or 5 civs in prior games).

However, the civs can be played for free as well.

Age of Empires

Home - Age of Empires

Age of Empires is the critically acclaimed, award winning Real Time Strategy (RTS) game with a legacy spanning over 20 years and nearly a dozen titles in the franchise.

Read full topic

item.title: AoE Beta Online Key
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:20, topic:392927”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=490099.msg3586890#msg3586890 date=1304258502]

except you start with 4 vill and you can make another two right away giving you 6 to collect food with. by the time you collected enough food for age II and created another 7 vill then moved over to trees for the age 2 cd you have about 2 minutes left. you need 1000 logs within 2 minutes and build 10 farms it seems rather impossible to do this way without some sort of item buffs.

What I try to do is build a store house as fast as possible and collect 80 wood right away (this gives me the ability to do the pickers talent) I then shift everyone to pick berries while i create 11 villagers. I put 1 villager on gold and then the rest on food until I hit 200. I then shift 10 onto wood while I wait for age 2. as soon as I hit age 2 i grab the wheelbarrow and continue with the wood. I can get around 900 wood by the end of 6 minutes but its simply not enough.

name - wood requirement
store house 100
pickers gloves 80
age 2 - 200
10 farms - 1,000
wheelbarrow - 100

Total wood needed: 1480

in 6 minutes and collecting food just simply seems impossible with not item buffs.

skip the upgrades and you save 180 wood, buy the age 1 adviser for 15% faster and cheaper farms(players usually sell for 500-800 gold, totally worth it) and that will save another 165 wood

if you can get it, the 50% cheaper storehouse star tech is the best in the game, and from one of the rare player stores you can buy the best villager tools for a mere 220 empire points and it gives 12% in everything, ace of warfare has the shop I believe
[/quote]There are tools that give 18%, but they are from a rare drop.

ye thats the point, this tool is 12% in everything(16% in wood too) and is easily available to everyone[/quote]You said best villager tools however, and they are not

Read full topic

except you start with 4 vill and you can make another two right away giving you 6 to collect food with. by the time you collected enough food for age II and created another 7 vill then moved over to trees for the age 2 cd you have about 2 minutes left. you need 1000 logs within 2 minutes and build 10 farms it seems rather impossible to do this way without some sort of item buffs.

item.title: AoE Beta Online Key
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Niall, post:14, topic:392927”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=490099.msg3584468#msg3584468 date=1304047446]
btw how does anyone build ten farms in 6 minutes… I can only get around 6 built before time runs out
[/quote]

microing helps a fuckton, I was seconds away from doing 10 farms in 5 minutes with only 6 villagers, some people have used 16-20 villagers

some tips

[ul][li]Get the mason philon age 1 adviser, the common version is 8% cheaper buildings and 8% faster building, the epic version is 15%, save anywhere from 80 to 150 wood[/li]
[li]The map is random, keep on resetting until you get a decent amount of cows and/or animals close[/li]
[li]Speaking of food, use cows and animals if you can get them close to your TC, get the food first and only get 200 + 50 for every villager you want(10 is a good start, so 700 food only)[/li]
[li]The cheaper storehouses are nice if you got the level 20 star tech, but either way build the store houses as far away from your TC as possible and close to lots of trees[/li]
[li]???[/li]
[li]Profit[/li][/ul]

if you can get some nice tools for your villagers it will help loads, you can get 6.6% in all and 9.8% in wood fairly early on[/quote]I don’t like giving exact info, but you can easily do it simply by producing 13 villagers, put on berry bushes, as soon as you have the pop for it queued up (in production at TC), wait until you hit 200 food, then put all on building storehouse right next to a forest, push age2 button. By the time you hit second age you’ll have anywhere between 300 and 500 wood, so take one villager and start producing farms. When you have 1 or 2 farms left, get 100/200 wood respectively and move all villagers to creating farms. Split them up in two groups and have them spam farms.

With this technique i had over 20 seconds spare time for the last challenge.

Read full topic

item.title: AoE Beta Online Key
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

btw how does anyone build ten farms in 6 minutes… I can only get around 6 built before time runs out

microing helps a fuckton, I was seconds away from doing 10 farms in 5 minutes with only 6 villagers, some people have used 16-20 villagers

some tips

[ul][li]Get the mason philon age 1 adviser, the common version is 8% cheaper buildings and 8% faster building, the epic version is 15%, save anywhere from 80 to 150 wood[/li]
[li]The map is random, keep on resetting until you get a decent amount of cows and/or animals close[/li]
[li]Speaking of food, use cows and animals if you can get them close to your TC, get the food first and only get 200 + 50 for every villager you want(10 is a good start, so 700 food only)[/li]
[li]The cheaper storehouses are nice if you got the level 20 star tech, but either way build the store houses as far away from your TC as possible and close to lots of trees[/li]
[li]???[/li]
[li]Profit[/li][/ul]

if you can get some nice tools for your villagers it will help loads, you can get 6.6% in all and 9.8% in wood fairly early on

Read full topic

item.title: AoE Beta Online Key
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3

btw how does anyone build ten farms in 6 minutes… I can only get around 6 built before time runs out
[/quote]Protip: You need 5 farms after that quest. I found it pretty easy, it’s all about villager distribution.[/quote]
this

basically, build loads of villagers and rape the shit out of all the wood/bushes you can find, then once you have all the supplies required take all the villagers you have and build all the farms
